Category: Create: Image, Question: Generate an image showing a flowchart for handling errors in the binding automation system with a POST request to /serials/binders branch based on HTTP responses. Log status 201 in the workflow. If a 400 bad request error occurs, log the payload and notify the automation team. For SAML token unauthorized issues, send a Slack alert to the admin. For a 404 Not Found error, halt the process and inform SciComm team. For a 429 Too Many Requests error, implement exponential backoff with up to 5 retries followed by an error status summary. Show the process times for all steps.
